title: Phillis and Flora The sweete and ciuill contention of two amorous ladyes. Translated out of Latine: by R.S. Esquire.
author: Map, Walter, fl. 1200.
publisher: By W. W[hite] for Richarde Iohnes,
notes: Running title reads: The amorous contention of Phillis and Flora.
This translation originally published as part of: Chapman, George.  Ovids banquet of sence.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
